title: Multiplication Kingdom - Animal Adventure
headerSub: Welcome to the Kingdom! Conquer cells, collect rare animals, and break records.
welcomeText:
Your goal is to conquer the entire multiplication table!
Click on a cell, solve a challenge, and collect a rare animal.

Good luck!
leaderboardNote: All players in the kingdom and their achievements:
feedbackSelect: Please select a profile to start.
feedbackManual: You selected a cell manually. Pass the challenge to conquer it.
feedbackAuto: Pass the challenge to conquer the cell and earn an animal.
feedbackDone: You've collected all the animals! Amazing!
feedbackReset: Profile reset. Starting a new journey üôÇ
confirmReset: Reset progress for this profile? This will delete conquered cells and animals.
confirmDelete: Delete profile '{name}'? This cannot be undone.
noAnimals: No animals yet. Conquer your first cell to get one üôÇ
scratchInstr: Scratch the cloud to find the animal!
popInstr: Pop 10 bubbles to reveal the secret!
matchInstr: Click the animal that appears twice!
orderInstr: Click the numbers in order: 1 to 6
starsInstr: Catch 8 sparkling stars before they vanish!
fireflyInstr: Catch 6 fireflies to light up the night!
potionInstr: Add 3 ingredients to the magic cauldron!
leafInstr: Clear the leaves to find who is hiding!
prestigeDesc: You conquered the entire kingdom! Do you want to start a new mission and earn a crown?
